hedline.hl1: Wong Doody Chosen For Clif Bar Account

abstract.p: Clif Bar Inc, which sells energy bars and other food products, names Los Angeles office of Wong Doody to handle its advertising account; billings estimated at $8 million (S)

block.p: Clif Bar Inc., which sells energy bars and other food products, yesterday named the Los Angeles office of Wong Doody to handle its account, which had been run in-house for the last year. Billings were estimated at $8 million. Dean Mayer, a spokesman for Clif Bar in Berkeley, Calif., confirmed a report of the decision on the Advertising Age World Wide Web site. The decision came, he said, after a review of 25 agencies was narrowed to Wong Doody and two other finalists: Black Rocket in San Francisco and Team One Advertising in El Segundo, Calif., owned by the Publicis Groupe S.A.
